sections.heading: education requirements; exceptions
sections.text: Sections 44-3901 to 44-3908 shall not apply to the following persons:(1) Licensees for whom an examination is not required under the laws of this state;(2) Licensees who sell or consult only in the areas of credit life insurance and credit accident and health insur
